name: Mark Notification Read
description: Update a notification's read status, toggling between unread and read.

user_id.description: User identifier that owns the notification.

read.description: Set to true to mark as read, false to mark as unread.

scope.description: Location of the notification (global or space). Defaults to auto-detect (global first, then space).

space_id.description: Space identifier when targeting a space-scoped notification outside the current context.
